name: Imperfect Chinese Room
description:
Everly is in love with Tarin, a boy around her age and a writer she met online... probably, she thinks. She isn't sure about how she feels.

He asked her out to a concert today. This is the perfect chance... but will she have the bravery to confess, or will her uncertainty and fear prevent her from doing so?

-

Imperfect Chinese Room is a Visual Novel with three endings. Guide the main character, Everly, through her date with her crush. Decide her thoughts, feelings and responses. Dig into Everly's background and attempt to understand her. Choose to spend the day enjoying small talk with a friend... or step bravely into a relationship.

...I do wonder, though. Could any of us truly connect with one another?

Features:

  • Relaxing slice-of-life content.
  • Maze mini-game.
  • Hand-drawn black-and-white graphics.
  • Beautiful soundtrack.
  • Three endings.

The word count is around 12k and the estimated playtime is around 30 minutes. The game is completely free, so please enjoy it during your break time!
